column1: * Glaurung issues forth from Nargothrond and approaches Brethil.
* Niënor Níniel conceives with Túrins child.

column3: goes in search of Glaurung. Hunthor is killed by a falling rock and Dorlas is killed by Brandir for deserting Túrin.

column1: * Túrin finds Glaurung and kills the dragon.

column2: Glaurung reveals to Níniel that she is Nienor and Túrin is her brother. She commits suicide by throwing herself off the Cabed-en-Aras into the river Taeglin. Brandir witnesses this.

column1: * Brandir tells Túrin that his wife is also his sister. Túrin disbelieves him and kills Brandir in anger.
* Túrin learns from Mablung that Brandir spoke the truth. Túrin commits suicide by falling on Gurthang.
* The House of Haleth erect a grave to Túrin and Nienor.
* The Petty-dwarves Mîm goes to Nargothrond and takes its treasure for his own.
